name: Syberia 2

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia 2/Syberia2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: -c "printf '0 BaseCMO.cmo'>$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia 2/player.ini"
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: false
